choose.when: AND ( CMN_COM_NM LIKE '%' || #{searchWord} || '%' OR CMN_COM_ETC1 LIKE '%' || #{searchWord} || '%' OR CMN_COM_ETC2 LIKE '%' || #{searchWord} || '%' OR CMN_COM_ETC3 LIKE '%' || #{searchWord} || '%' )

mapper.select: /* CommonCodeManager.selectCommonCodeManagerInfo */ SELECT ( SELECT CMN_COM_NM FROM T_CMM_COM WHERE CMN_COM_IDX = CMN.CMN_COM_TOP_IDX ) AS CMN_COM_TOP_NM, ( SELECT CMN_COM_NM FROM T_CMM_COM WHERE CMN_COM_IDX = CMN.CMN_COM_UP_IDX ) AS CMN_COM_UP_NM, CMN.CMN_COM_IDX, CMN.CMN_COM_NM, CMN.CMN_COM_LEVEL, CMN.CMN_COM_UP_IDX, CMN.CMN_COM_TOP_IDX, CMN.CMN_COM_ETC1, CMN.CMN_COM_ETC2, CMN.CMN_COM_ETC3, CMN.CMN_COM_SORT, CMN.CMN_COM_USE_YN, CMN.CMN_COM_REG_DT, CMN.CMN_COM_REG_IP, CMN.CMN_COM_REG_ID, CMN.CMN_COM_UPD_DT, CMN.CMN_COM_UPD_IP, CMN.CMN_COM_UPD_ID FROM T_CMM_COM CMN WHERE CMN_COM_IDX = #{CMN_COM_IDX}
mapper.insert: /* CommonCodeManager.insertCommonCodeManager */ INSERT INTO T_CMM_COM ( CMN_COM_IDX, CMN_COM_NM, CMN_COM_LEVEL, CMN_COM_UP_IDX, CMN_COM_TOP_IDX, CMN_COM_ETC1, CMN_COM_ETC2, CMN_COM_ETC3, CMN_COM_SORT, CMN_COM_USE_YN, CMN_COM_REG_DT, CMN_COM_REG_IP, CMN_COM_REG_ID ) VALUES ( SEQ_CMM_COM_IDX.NEXTVAL, #{CMN_COM_NM}, NVL(#{CMN_COM_LEVEL}, 0), NVL(#{CMN_COM_UP_IDX}, 0), NVL(#{CMN_COM_TOP_IDX}, 0), #{CMN_COM_ETC1}, #{CMN_COM_ETC2}, #{CMN_COM_ETC3}, ( SELECT NVL(MAX(CMN_COM_SORT), 0) + 1 FROM T_CMM_COM WHERE CMN_COM_UP_IDX = NVL(#{CMN_COM_UP_IDX}, 0) ), NVL(#{CMN_COM_USE_YN}, 'N'), TO_CHAR(SYSDATE, 'YYYYMMDDHH24MISS'), #{CMN_COM_REG_IP}, #{CMN_COM_REG_ID} )
mapper.update: /* CommonCodeManager.updateCommonCodeManager */ UPDATE T_CMM_COM SET CMN_COM_NM = #{CMN_COM_NM}, CMN_COM_ETC1 = #{CMN_COM_ETC1}, CMN_COM_ETC2 = #{CMN_COM_ETC2}, CMN_COM_ETC3 = #{CMN_COM_ETC3}, CMN_COM_USE_YN = NVL(#{CMN_COM_USE_YN}, 'N'), CMN_COM_UPD_DT = TO_CHAR(SYSDATE, 'YYYYMMDDHH24MISS'), CMN_COM_UPD_IP = #{CMN_COM_UPD_IP}, CMN_COM_UPD_ID = #{CMN_COM_UPD_ID} WHERE CMN_COM_IDX = #{CMN_COM_IDX}
